svg.text: ESP-WROOM-32 | DHT11 | MQ-4 | MQ-135 | 2N2222 | 4×1.2 V Battery
• Voltage dividers (R2/R3, R4/R5) scale 5 V sensor output to ≤3.3 V for ESP32 ADC
• Q1 (2N2222) disconnects all sensors from GND during deep sleep to save power
• R1 is a pull-up resistor for the DHT11 one-wire DATA line
• Deep sleep: 30 min | Warmup: 3 min | Protocol: HMAC-SHA256 authenticated TCP
